title: Engagement Enhancement and Performance Analysis Strategies in Online Collaborative Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Tool Proficiency and Group Collaboration Experience
context.additional_context: An offline classroom setting for strengthening science-related job competencies among corporate managers/leaders. Requires collaborative learning design in smartphone-based limited-technology environments (no PC access).

learning_goals: Learners can proactively participate in science topic-based discussion forums using online collaboration tools at an 80% or higher rate.
Through smartphone-based wiki creation and group assignments, learners can collaboratively complete science problem-solving solutions three or more times.
By analyzing online learning activity logs, learners can accurately explain 70% or more of the connections between their participation levels and outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
